body_html:
Jenkins, test this please.
…
On Apr 20, 2017 1:30 PM, "Till Hoffmann" ***@***.***> wrote: ***@***.**** commented on this pull request. ------------------------------ In third_party/libzmq.BUILD <#8728 (comment)> : > @@ -0,0 +1,241 @@ +package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"]) + +licenses(["notice"]) # LGPL license with exception for static linking (for libzmq) + +genrule( + name = "configure", + outs = ["platform.hpp"], + cmd = "cd external/libzmq && ./configure && cd ../..; cp external/libzmq/src/platform.hpp $@", +) Not sure what the best thing to do here is. Do you build on windows using MSVC? The configure <https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/blob/3f80657c247bf14ba29d6de3cf8aeea8d0f1bc87/configure.ac> script of libzmq seems pretty sophisticated and I don't know whether just copying the file is sufficient. I'm afraid I don't have a windows machine to test it. — You are receiving this because you commented. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#8728 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AT_Sbe-wM-o-YyAilnjTiz0sv7bjdmwKks5rx8BPgaJpZM4MphR-> .
body_text:
Jenkins, test this please.
…
On Apr 20, 2017 1:30 PM, "Till Hoffmann" ***@***.***> wrote:
 ***@***.**** commented on this pull request.
 ------------------------------

 In third_party/libzmq.BUILD
 <#8728 (comment)>
 :

 > @@ -0,0 +1,241 @@
 +package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
 +
 +licenses(["notice"])  # LGPL license with exception for static linking (for libzmq)
 +
 +genrule(
 +    name = "configure",
 +    outs = ["platform.hpp"],
 +    cmd = "cd external/libzmq && ./configure && cd ../..; cp external/libzmq/src/platform.hpp $@",
 +)

 Not sure what the best thing to do here is. Do you build on windows using
 MSVC? The configure
 <https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/blob/3f80657c247bf14ba29d6de3cf8aeea8d0f1bc87/configure.ac>
 script of libzmq seems pretty sophisticated and I don't know whether just
 copying the file is sufficient. I'm afraid I don't have a windows machine
 to test it.

 —
 You are receiving this because you commented.
 Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
 <#8728 (comment)>,
 or mute the thread
 <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AT_Sbe-wM-o-YyAilnjTiz0sv7bjdmwKks5rx8BPgaJpZM4MphR->
 .
body:
Jenkins, test this please.

On Apr 20, 2017 1:30 PM, "Till Hoffmann" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> *@tillahoffmann* commented on this pull request.
> ------------------------------
>
> In third_party/libzmq.BUILD
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/8728#discussion_r112553031>
> :
>
> > @@ -0,0 +1,241 @@
> +package(default_visibility = ["//visibility:public"])
> +
> +licenses(["notice"])  # LGPL license with exception for static linking (for libzmq)
> +
> +genrule(
> +    name = "configure",
> +    outs = ["platform.hpp"],
> +    cmd = "cd external/libzmq && ./configure && cd ../..; cp external/libzmq/src/platform.hpp $@",
> +)
>
> Not sure what the best thing to do here is. Do you build on windows using
> MSVC? The configure
> <https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/blob/3f80657c247bf14ba29d6de3cf8aeea8d0f1bc87/configure.ac>
> script of libzmq seems pretty sophisticated and I don't know whether just
> copying the file is sufficient. I'm afraid I don't have a windows machine
> to test it.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you commented.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
